name: The Rollbar alert lamp
tagline: A 3D printed lamp that changes its behavior upon receiving a rollbar alert
body:
### General Description of the lamp

This 3D printed desktop lamp is enabled by a [Particle Photon](https://www.particle.io/). The Photon is a prototyping tool that comes with a Wi-Fi chipset. This enables interfacing sensors/actuators to the internet and monitor them remotely. This lamp is equipped with a 24 Pixel circular RGB LED strip called the [Neopixel from Adafruit Industries ](https://www.adafruit.com/product/1586). 

The Particle Photon can produce different color combinations on the RGB LED strip as shown in the picture below:  
  

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sai-y/photon_desktop_lamp/master/desktop_lamp.jpg) 

### Setting up the lamp

The following are needed for the lamp:  
  
1. Particle Photon  
2. 3D printed enclosure + lamp shade  
3. Micro USB cable  
4. 24 pixel Neopixel ring. 
  

![](http://i.imgur.com/2F0I7H2.gif)
